chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason K. Metz #00641623 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault), a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Provide DNA Sample if not already done.
Maintain sex offender registration.
Comply with sex offender evaluation and complete any treatment that is recommended from the evaluation.
No contact with LM during the term of the sentence. Once the Defendant is released and LM is an adult she can have contact if she wishes.
If she wishes to have contact before she turns 18, she and her mother can talk to the probation agent to get approval for the contact.
Maintain absolute sobriety.
Pay court ordered financial obligations.
Complete the specific programs as order by the Department and any other conditions set by the Agent during extended supervision.

supervisions.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: 12:04  Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PSI and alternate PSI have both been filed and reviewed with the defendant. Court corrects the offense date in the PSI   add the on or between July 2009 and August 2012.  Take out the expelled from school on the compass.  Froelich gives recomendation.  Register sex offender  No contact with Lexi, DNA samle and surcharge  Sex offender eval and treatment  absolute sobriety, State Prison confinement15 years  10 years of ES  Kathy Licht reads statement to the the court of LM.  Patti Quade addresses the court. MM addresses the court   Carrie Bropray addresses the court. Willaim Markert addresses the court. Defendant Jason Metz addresses the court. Attorney Gherty addresses the court. Court informs the defendant of the non- possession of firearms for felons. Court orders 10 years in the WI  State Prison system  6 years confinement and 4 years extended supervision.  Conditions of Extended Supervision are Maintain Sex Offender Registration, Provide  DNA sample if not already done and pay DNA surcharge,Comply with sex offender evaluation and complete any treatment  that  is recomended from the evaluation. No contact with LM during the term of the sentence . Once the defendant is released and LM is an adult she can have contact if she wishes. If she wishes to have contact before she turns 18 she and her mother can talk to the probation agent  to get approval for the contact.  Maintain absolute Sobriety   Pay Court ordered financial  obligations.  Complete the specific programs as ordered by the department  and any other conditions set by the agent  during extended supervision.   Bond is discharged.

9:12  Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 23Jurors are seated. Judge does general voir dire of the panel. Individual voir dire was done of juror 332. Atty Froelich voir dires the panel.  Atty Gherty voir dires the panel. Attorneys make 5 strikes each. 21 jurors are selected.  Jury panel is sw and excused for 20 minutes. Attys are in the courtroom and Atty Froelich addresses the court regarding preliminary insturction. 11:04  Recess  15 minutes. 
11:29  Court resumes  Attys, defendant, and jury are present.  Judge gives preliminary insturction to the jury. Atty Froelich gives opening statement.  Atty Gherty gives his opening statement.  12:43 Jury is excused for lunch.  Attys, defendant are present in court.  Discuss IM claim.12:52 Recess for lunch

Froelich gives his objection to the examination by Gherty re video that was ruled on. Gherty makes an offer of proof . Gherty makes a motion to dismiss.  Court denies the motion to dismiss. 2:22 Jury returns to the courtroom. Gherty continues X-exam of J Wolf. Exh 162  Printout of Midwest Psy Web Site.  Exh # 163 Page from Lindkin of  Ms Young. Exh # 157  Child Protection Report  offered and received. Exh # 159  Addtional Child Protection Report. Froelich re-directs. Kathleen Licht is sw and ex by Froelich. Exh #2 CD Audio of Kathy Licht and LM Exh # 1&2 are offered and rec. 5:05  Jury is excused.  Offer of proof on exh 162 and 163 by Gherty.
12-10-2015    8:30 AM Court resumes Attorneys, defendant and jury are present. Direct examination of Kathy LIcht continues by Froelich.  Atty Gherty x-exams.  Exh # 168 15CV6  filing.  Exh # 169 15CV7 filing  Exh # 168 & 169 are offered and received.Exh 153 CD Audio is played for jury.   Froelich re-directs.  Exh #153 is offered and received. 10:11 Recess until 10:28.  Court resumes  10:34   Attorneys, defendant and jury are present.  Margaret Carney is sw and ex by Sean Froelich. Exh # 3 DVD Offered and received. The DVD is played for the jury. Margaret Carney's interview with LM.  Exh 4 drawing of female child  Exh 5 drawing of adult male Exh 4 & 5 are offered and received. Atty Gherty x-exams. Exh 170 M Carney's report  offered and received.  Froelich re-directs. 12:09  Break for lunch.  Court resume at 1:10 PM
1:15 Court resumes. Attorneys, defendant and jury are present.  LM is sw and ex by Froelich. Witness ID's the defendant Atty Gherty x-exams LM. Froelich recalls Kathy Licht and exams her.    State Rests  1:37     Dr Richard Babbit is sw and ex by Atty Gherty. Froelich x-exams. Gherty re- directs.  Froelich re-x-exams.  3:00  Recess for 15 minutes.  3:16 Court resumes.  Attorneys, defendant, and jury are present. Gary Krutke is sw and ex by Gherty. Froelich  x-exams.  Gherty re-directs  Jennifer Knutson is sw  and ex by Gherty. Exh # 155 DVD interview with Jennifer Knutson and defendant. 5:00  Jury is excused for the night.  Court will resume at 8:30 tomorrow.  5:03  PM
12/11/15  8:15 AM   OFF the RECORD  Informal jury instruction conference with the attorneys and defendant present. 8:25 AM  recess.  
8:34  Attys and defendant are in the courtroom.  Atty Gherty addresses stats. regarding hostile witnesses. Judge responds. 8:39  The jury retruns to the courtroom.  Jennifer Knutson retakes the stand and Atty Froelich x-exams.    Carl Pettersen is sw and exam by Gherty.  Jamon Metz is sw and ex by Gherty. Froelich x-ex.  Kerry Licht is sw and ex by Gherty. Ruby Wentzel is sw and ex by Gherty. Patricia Quade is sw and ex by Gherty. Froelich x-exams.  Marriah Metz is sw and ex by Gherty. Froelich x-exams . 10:18  Recess  10:38  ON the record Attys discuss the photos and videos that Atty Gherty wants to introduce in his exam of defendant. Willow River Park video will be admitted.  Holiday celebration video will not be allowed. Approx 15 photos will be allowed. Motion by Gherty reserved his right to dismiss that there was not enough evidence for this case to  go to the jury . Court denies motions.  Exh # 168 Dr. Babbitt's report. Judge reviews the defendant's right to testify in his own defense with him. Defendant waives his right to remain silent.  10:50  Jury returns to the courtroom.  Carol Rich is sw and ex by Gherty. Ms. Rich appears in court via Skype.  Atty Froelich x-exams. Jason Metz is sw and exam by Atty Gherty. Atty Gherty - exhs 130, 141,142,115,117,116,114,111,108,135,101,136,102,131,143,138, are a collection of photos which are all offered and rec.   Exh 147 Letter from the tooth fairy to LM  Exh  146 Letter from the tooth fairy to IM . Exh 147, 146 are offered and received.   Exh 152 Video "Day at the Falls". Froelich x-exams.  12:24  Defense Rests.    Break for 10 MInutes.  Court resumes - State has no rebuttal witnessess.   
Jury is excused for lunch. 12:36  Attys and defendant are present.  Atty Gherty makes motion to dismiss.  Court denies the motion to dismiss.  Gherty renews his motion to to receive exh # 167.  Court states that motion is denied.   Court reviews the instructions to be given to the jury.   100, 110, 2107, 255A, 140, 103, 145, 170, 157, 155, 148, 147, 150, 190, 195, 300, 160, 465,480,515. Gherty makes a motion for the missing witness instruction be read. Court denies that request. 12:48  Break for lunch  1:33  Court resumes. The Attys, defendant and jury are present. Judge insturcts the jury. Froelich gives his closing argument. 2:21  Gherty gives his closing argument. 2:57  Froelich gives closing statement. 2:59  Judge gives the final insturctions to the jury.  Extra juror SK is excused   Bailiffs are sworn Jury is excused to deliberate 3:04
4:36  Attys and defendant are present.  The jury has a request. They want to review 2 DVDs.  Attys agree. 4:47  Jury returns to the courtroom and Exh 2&3 will be replayed for the jury.  5:53  Jury returns to the jury room to deliberate.  8:05 Court resumes. Jury returns with a verdict  .  
Court :  jury finds the defendant  guilty.Jury is polled.  8:08  Jury is excused.   Atys and defendant are present.  Court finds the defendant guilty of the charge in the information.    Court orders a PSI  Froelich request the bond be revoked. Gherty requests the signature bond stay in place.   The  bond will continue as a signature bond.

9:40 a.m.  Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State calls Anna Salter.  Gherty addresses the court regarding Daubert rules and Learned Treatise.  Salter appears by phone and is sworn.  Froelich examines Dr. Salter.  Gherty cross examines Dr. Salter.  Froelich -No redirect.   Gherty does re cross. Break at 10:57.  Back on the record at 11:20 a.m.  Froelich gives argument.  Gherty gives argument.  Court rules standard has been met to allow Dr. Salter to testify.  Court wants written arguments regarding use of Predator within 30 days.

Hearing at 10-13-2015 09:00 am.
Jury trial at 12-09-2015 08:30 am.

11:34  Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Froelich  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Gherty addresses the discovery that he has not received and Daubert hearing. Requests sanction. Froelich  responds.  Daubert is discussed . Schedule Daubert hearing and witness can appear by telephone. Do this hearing in October on the trial date and do the trial on  Dec 9, 10, 11.  Gherty objects to this. Court will leave this on the calendar for the jury trial in October and we will set date for Daubert hearing. NO date is available between now and the trial date. Court will do the Daubert hearing on one of the trial days in October and the jury trial will be set the 9,10,11 of December.  Jury trial scheduled for December 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Hearing scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 09:00 am.

8:36  Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Froelich addresses their motion for continuance. Gherty objects. States that depositions can be done of this witness - witness is for foundation only.  Gherty makes a speedy trial demand.  Attorneys feel that this case will take 3 -4 days.  Court will continue case until Oct 13, 14, 15, & 16th.   Gherty's motion is addressed. Court feels it is important to due an incamera inspection of the MH records. Court will be reviewing the records tomorrow and hopes to have something back to the attorneys next week. Froelich is to find out if a DVD exists and if so provide a copy to Gherty.   Motion on Franks Delware Motion is addressed by Gherty.  Froelich responds to the motion. Court finds no action on behalf of the DA office that is a reckless disregard of the information that should have been included in the complaint.  Court denies the motion. Case will go to trial on Oct 13th for 4 days.  Set for another final pretrial. Clerk will call. extra jurors for this case.

records.addlTxt: 10:07 Defendant Jason K. Metz in court with attorney Mark J Gherty.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has copy of complaint.   Defendant waives reading of the complaint.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Froelich: $5000 signature, prints and no contact with IKM DOB 9/2/04, LMN DOB 6/18/2007 and Kathleen Licht. Atty Gherty no objection with sign bond and addresses no contact based on family filing with a GAL and no abusive contact with Kathleen Licht.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 04:00 pm. Def was in the army.
